protein.specific_function: In the nervous system, could hydrolyze ATP and other nucleotides to regulate purinergic neurotransmission. Hydrolyzes ADP only to a marginal extent. The order of activity with different substrates is ATP > GTP > CTP = ITP > UTP >> ADP = UDP.

reference.reference_text: Chadwick BP, Frischauf AM: Cloning and mapping of a human and mouse gene with homology to ecto-ATPase genes. Mamm Genome. 1997 Sep;8(9):668-72.
Mateo J, Harden TK, Boyer JL: Functional expression of a cDNA encoding a human ecto-ATPase. Br J Pharmacol. 1999 Sep;128(2):396-402.
